issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Hive shouldn't use HBase's Base64 implementation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: Appears Hive has dependencies on hbase 2.0.0-alpha4 releases. HBase 2.0.0 and 2.0.1 have been released. HBase team recommends 2.0.1 and says there shouldnt be any API surprises. (but we never know)
fields.summary: Upgrade HBase dependencies off alpha4 release

comments.body: [~ashutoshc] Could you please review? Is there room to push this to branch-3 as well ?

+1 pending tests
.. yeah should go in branch-3 as well.
